Package oilwells

Class OilWell

java.lang.Object
oilwells.OilWell
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppConnector<OilCargo,​java.lang.Integer>
public class OilWell
extends java.lang.Object
implements AppConnector<OilCargo,​java.lang.Integer>
Main class of the application. It implements the AppConnector interface to receive calls from the DistributedSnapshot library. It implements the public methods that the user can call from the command line interface. It uses a thread to periodically send oil to a randomly chosen well.

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.lang.String hostname, int port, int oilAmount) throws StateUpdateException
      It is called to set the initial oil amount and set hostname and port inside the library
      Parameters:
      hostname - the hostname of this node
      port - the port of this node
      oilAmount - the initial oil amount
      Throws:
      StateUpdateException - thrown if an error occur during the update of the state

    • join

      public void join​(java.lang.String hostname, int port)
      It is called to join an existing network of nodes
      Parameters:
      hostname - the hostname of the gateway used to join the network
      port - the port of the gateway used to join the network

    • handleIncomingMessage

      public void handleIncomingMessage​(java.lang.String senderHostname, int senderPort, OilCargo message)
      It handles a new incoming message. It updates the oil amount contained on the oil well
      Specified by:
      handleIncomingMessage in interface AppConnector<OilCargo,​java.lang.Integer>
      Parameters:
      senderHostname - the hostname of the sender
      senderPort - the port assigned to the RMI registry of the sender
      message - the message that the remote node sent

    • handleNewConnection

      public void handleNewConnection​(java.lang.String newConnectionHostname, int newConnectionPort)
      It handles a new connection initiated from the other oil well. It updates the directConnections variable
      Specified by:
      handleNewConnection in interface AppConnector<OilCargo,​java.lang.Integer>
      Parameters:
      newConnectionHostname - the hostname of the node requesting the connection
      newConnectionPort - the port assigned to the RMI registry of the new connection

      Parameters:
      removeConnectionHostname - the hostname of the node requesting the removal of the connection
